content.text:
# List of Breaking the Magician's Code: Magic's Biggest Secrets Finally Revealed episodes

This is a list of ''Breaking the Magician's Code: Magic's Biggest Secrets Finally Revealed episodes.
The original specials
* Denotes illusions only shown on the VHS release.''
{|
! colspan="2" bgcolor="#DDDDF6"| List of Illusions Revealed
|-
! bgcolor="#DDDDF6" width="20%"|Episode OneNovember 24, 1997 (US)September 19, 2010 (HK)
|
# Lady to Tiger
# Chinese Lantern
# Levitation
# Exploding Packing Crate
# Zig Zag Girl
# Chinese Linking Rings
# Metamorphosis
# Sawing a Woman in Half (Selbit's Sawing)
# Pulling a Rabbit Out of a Hat
# Sword Basket
# Vanishing Elephant
# Woman in the Painting*
# Noah's Ark*
|-
| colspan="2" bgcolor="#DDDDF6"|
|-
! bgcolor="#DDDDF6" width="20%"|Episode TwoMarch 3, 1998 (US)September 26, 2010 (HK)
|
# Crusher
# Teleportation
# Lady of Steel (Assistant balances 2 women on her arms alone)
# Vanishing Scarves
# Walking Through a Solid Brick Wall
# Suit of Armor
# Shooting an Arrow Through a Woman
# Switching Places
# Disappearing Doves
# Box of Pain (Magician sticks a sword and daggers through an assistant's head in a box)
# Water Torture Escape
|-
| colspan="2" bgcolor="#DDDDF6"|
|-
! bgcolor="#DDDDF6" width="20%"|Episode ThreeMay 5, 1998 (US)October 3, 2010 (HK)
|
# Bed of Spikes (Death of Cora)
# The Stretch (Magician stretches an assistant's arms & legs to the breaking point)
# Daggers of Death (Knife-throwing at an assistant while strapped to a wheel)
# Disappearing Scarf
# The Haunted House
# Disappearing Radio
# Bullet Catch
# Turning Water Into Ice
# Mismatch Girl
# Vanishing Tank
|-
| colspan="2" bgcolor="#DDDDF6"|
|-
! bgcolor="#DDDDF6" width="20%"|Episode Four - Unmasking the Magician: The Final RevealOctober 29, 1998 (US)October 10, 2010 (HK)
|
# Car Crusher Escape
# Cremation
# Spike Torture (Magician crushes an assistant in a wall of spikes)
# Guillotine
# Buried Alive
# Pincushion Thumb
# Death Trap
# The Cannon and the Crate*
|}
2002 special
{|
! colspan="2" bgcolor="#DDDDF6"| List of Grand Illusions Revealed
